name: Westville Dumbo
address: 81 Washington Street Apartments, 81 Washington St, Brooklyn, NY 11201, USA

reviews.text: Rodolfo was super nice! Good experience
kleine Lokal mit leckere Speisekarte, da wir nicht viel Hunger hatten... gab nur was zu trinken und selbst gemachte sÃ¼ÃŸ Kartoffeln pommes ... lecker
the GOAT spot in Dumbo - go here they got you
Their Caesarâ€™s Salad is one of the best Iâ€™ve had.
Great service!
Great spot right on Washington  so you can get your Brooklyn Bridge/Empire State Building photo! Try the breakfast burrito!
Edited in 2025: always had great experiences before. But during my most recent visit, I think the waiter didn't know the meaning of dairy allergy, which was not a great experience for me afterwards.
Roberto was so sweet and gentle, very attentive and caring. He made sure we were comfortable and was very respectful. We surely would come back, thank you!

I visit my son in New York and we always try a new place.  I will definitely be coming back the food was so good so fresh perfectly cooked.  Service was excellent and I love the atmosphere.   I recommend the salmon plate I got the asparagus with Parmesan cheese and the kale with caramelized onions.  My son got the kale salad. We also ordered the empanadas for an appetizer everything was excellent. I can't wait to come back

Nice. Great poached eggs and burgers were ğŸ‘Œ. Busy but chilled restaurant and no reservation but they found a lovely table for us and we were served in good time. Service swift and attentive and prices some of the best we have encountered in NY! $15 for a full plate whereas $23+ has become absolutely normal.
The hamburger left notes of truffle â€”Jacobo Sanchez
Tasty pickle juice margarita! ğŸ¹
Superbe adresse dans Brooklyn - typique :) et surtout on y mange trÃ¨s bien ! Le service est impeccable ğŸ‘ŒğŸ‘Œ
Exceptional service
Lovely staff, lovely food, perfect location.
Belle dÃ©couverte ğŸ¤©ğŸ¥—ğŸª

Good mac and cheese !
Quick and nice service
It was a perfect brunch, thank you ğŸ˜Š
Awesome food, drink and service in general
Fanâ€¦. Bloodyâ€¦. Tastic!
Amazing empanada

10/10 no notes! Loved the variety of food options to choose from, especially all the fresh market vegetables. And the cute little patio had great ambiance. Friendly service, would definitely come back. We had the breaded chicken cutlet with cauliflower and yuca fries, and the lemon basil spritz!
Er fijne plek om te eten
Great lunch spot before heading to the Brooklyn Bridge pedestrian walkway nearby.
Lovely place with nice atmosphere and tasty food
Our waiter was very friendly and efficient!
Amazing
It's fine.
GarÃ§om Roberto muito atencioso
Roberto was a wonderful waiter. Very friendly. The French toast was amazing!!!!
La comida muy buena y lo mejor la atenciÃ³n de nuestro camarero Roberto. Excelente

Precioso lugar en Dumbo. La calle con mejores vistas de la zona.
AtenciÃ³n esmerada por el personal, muy atento y servicial. Buenos productos, bien preparados y presentados. RelaciÃ³n calidad/precios inmejorable. Como siempre las bebidas alcohÃ³licas son costosas. Para todos los gustos. Recomendable 100%.

Came in for brunch on Saturday and was very impressed by the food and service. The waffles were fantastic and the eggs were nice and fluffy. Definitely would recommend for a decent priced spot in the area

Great spot in Dumbo! The chilaquiles were delicious and the food overall was fresh and tasty. Loved the beautiful outdoor spaceâ€”perfect for a relaxed meal. Friendly service too. Would definitely come back!

Westville DUMBO is my go-to spot for fresh, healthy, and consistently delicious food. Iâ€™ve ordered delivery and dined in, and every time the experience is excellent. The staff is always friendly and welcoming, and the vibe is relaxed but vibrant. Whether youâ€™re grabbing a quick bite or sitting down for a full meal, everything is packed with flavor and feels good to eat. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a wholesome, satisfying meal in the area!

Service was great !
Why 4 stars not 5 ?...
Same salad on all dishes which was nice but mid.
3 oz steak and 2 scrambled eggs for 29 dollars !
Sat in patio, fans were not on and AC did not work ! Why lol !
Best dish: birria
Worst dish: avocado toast
One of the best brunch spots Iâ€™ve ever been to. Costumer service was amazing and the place was very clean.

Had a vegetarian burger and coffee here. Both were good. Especially loved the burger with fries.

Service was decent and the guy managing the incoming audience is friendly and helpful.

Bit of a slow service otherwise but if you reach out to him he certainly helps.
Attentive service, a lovely patio with warm lights, and a great variety of healthy dishesâ€”meat, fish, veggies, fries, yuca, and more. Delicious desserts too. Weâ€™ll be back!
I would call this place hidden gem. Food is delicious. Little feedback. I think you guys need better waiters. But in general food quality covers everything. And location is great

Wowâ€¦ what a fascinating place. Because it was Tuesday, they had free kidsâ€™ meals, so we went inâ€¦ and it was absolutely delicious. Even the fries were tasty. The prices were quite reasonable too.
Super vriendelijke bediening. Het eten is goed en de sfeer relaxed. Je voelt je hier welkom. Service is prima. Fijne zaak om wat te eten als je Brooklyn bent.
My best dining experience this far. The staff is super friendly, food and drinks on point and atmosphere was great. 100% recommended!

First time coming to Dumbo location, the service was slow. Waited for a bit to order. The server was all her alone for outdoor sitting.

The drinks and food came at the same time, which was not what I prefer for brunch.

They only have limited options for brunch. Which was another disappointment. I usually get pesto chicken salad. But they didnâ€™t have it in the Dumbo location.

I got steak sandwich with fries, my boy friend got the hamburger. And we got Greek salad to share.

The salad was not fresh at all. The feta cheese was delicious. The dressing was very good. I hope it could be fresh, when it comes to greens in salad I prefer when itâ€™s fully fresh ingredients.

The hamburger & sandwich didnâ€™t really taste good. It was 5/10 to be honest. The fries were too oily for us. The taste of oil makes me really uncomfortable after ate.

Cocktails was not good as it used to be as the other location offers more option and more fresh ingredients. Not sure if weâ€™ll visit again.

Dumbo. An unusual name for a neighborhood if you are a tourist. And yet New York manages to make so many things sound cool - even the term Dumbo being used for a neighborhood. Located right across the river on the other side of Brooklyn Bridge - after walking the entire length of the bridge we chanced upon Westville, Dumbo.
A bit of a quirky, but fun place to be. Daily specials for beers on tap and a regular menu meant we ordered a Ceasar salad, Fries, Mac n Cheese for the kids and finished it all with a slice of American Pie.
While the food was good, service was astonishingly slow. Especially being used to the pace of NYC by then, it was almost as if we were part of the furniture!
Thankfully the food worked out and it was refreshing to sip fresh beer on tap after crossing the Brooklyn Bridge on what was deemed to be the hottest day in New York up until that point!
For views of the bridge itself, it is walkable from here, which makes it convenient.

Food was absolutely delicious!!!! 100% recommend especially if you want fresh produce prepared in the most delicious way. Didn't take long for food to be prepared. A bit pricey but the portions are pretty big. It was my first time visiting and the waitress could have done a better job with recommendations or explanation of the dishes. She also took quite some time to take empty dishes away or go bring the bill.
We loved our meal here! A large assortment of delicious vegetable side dishes, or for a main course.

Didnâ€™t plan to come here but crossed the Brooklyn bridge and got a little hungry. This was a wonderful find; great fruit and veges market platter, and the best sweet potato fries. The buttermilk chicken burger was a bit dry but still tasty. Would come here again!

The homemade veggie burger here is sensational - it's their newest menu item, a special they've been continuing because it's doing so well. I'm a carnivore and yet I crave this veggie burger. It's so good that even my dog loves it and he always spits out veggies. I always upgrade to their sweet potatoes cause they're delicious. They've also got a lofty brunch menu, and I'm a fan of their waffles and scrambled eggs dish for that savory-sweet combo. Thanks for the weekly veggie burger bonanza!

5 stars!!!!

Westville is always a solid go-to, and the two things I never skip are the truffle parm fries and the kale salad. The fries are a must-try if youâ€™re coming. The kale salad is simple but really satisfyingâ€”I added breaded chicken and salmon to mine.

It comes with walnuts, cherries, and a few other ingredients which were a surprisingly good combo, all tied together with a light lemon vinaigrette. Pairing the fries with the salad feels like the best of both worlds, something hearty and something light.

It is on the pricey side though, I paid around $45 for everything. Would definitely get again but be aware itâ€™s not cheap.

Food was excellent. My girlfriend was completely spoiled for choice which rarely happens because sheâ€™s quite picky with food. My steak was excellent and the peas with bacon and onions were fantastic.
Highly recommended for anyone coming to Brooklyn or NYC on holiday/vacation.

Delicious! And the people are so courteous and sweet.

It was my first time here from India and so got their classic margarita and Asian Crispy Chicken, it was yummy.

The vibe is amazing and Miss Jessica got me a free chocolate cookie on the house because it was my first time in NYC. Canâ€™t get better than that.

Highly recommend!

This restaurant delivers on its menu promises. All offerings provide eating enjoyment. The service was AWESOME! The mood here is perfect, everything's clean, and service is welcoming. I enjoyed every moment of my visit.

Carlos was an exceptional server, always attentive and quick with a warm smile that made our dining experience truly enjoyable. The food was nothing short of exquisite; each dish was a work of art, bursting with flavor and beautifully presented. Without a doubt, we will eagerly return to savor another delightful meal in this wonderful establishment.
I loved the garden (outdoors). It was relatively quiet. We had egg Benedict and Burritos and they were great. Staff friendly.

The restaurant was beautifully decorated and pleasing to the eye. However, the food and drinks (cappuccino, chorizo egg and cheese, chilaquiles) didnâ€™t meet the expectations).

The westville waffles were nice and filling.

The customer service was great!

Randomly chose to come here for lunch and we were not disappointed! Conveniently right on the iconic Dumbo street.

Space: Very spacious; there were seats inside, at a covered patio, and outside! Came in a group of 5 because the weather was amazing we decided to sit outside.

Service: Normal, we had a friendly server and we were seated right away

Food: Great! For the appetizers/sharable, we got the Smokey Mac & Cheese($13), Sweet Potato Fries($8), and Truffle Parm Fries($9) all were actually 10/10! As for the entrees, 3/5 of us got the Grilled Marinated Sirloin Steak($29 ea), cooked perfectly to each of our liking as well as the Grilled Salmon($21), wasnâ€™t dry! Both steak and salmon is part of the â€œplatesâ€ so it came with 2 market vegetables. Market vegetable; Asparagus with parmesan (10/10 this was the best side), Kale with spinach, shallots, and pumpkin seeds (6/10), Green peas with bacon and caramelized onions (8/10 my friend throughly enjoyed it), Roasted sweet potato with sour cream and scallion (8/10), Roasted mushroom with leek and fresh herbs (5/10 I LOVE mushroom so i was really looking forward to some mushroom but my friend and I couldnâ€™t get passed this taste that we couldnâ€™t tell from guessing the leek so not for us) and lastly Roasted rainbow carrots with fresh herbs (7/10 just carrots). We also got the CBLT with side salad($16) and it was okay nothing grand.

Drinks: Lemonade ($6) very refreshing!

20% gratuity is auto added for groups of 6 or more and it was added for us even though we were 5 which we were going to anyways so thatâ€™s not really an issue for us, just a heads up for others.

Ottimo! Personale gentile, cibo delizioso e bell'ambiente. Se si Ã¨ nei pressi di Brooklin nel quartiere Dumbo, questo Ã¨ il posto adatto per gustarsi un buon pranzo.
Gli ingredienti sono genuini e pieni di gusto. Assaggiato il petto di pollo grigliato, con cavoletti di Bruxelles e pure di patate all'aglio ed era buonissimo.
Bowls e insalate sono anche da provare.
Consigliato

Beautiful outdoor garden with great people watching on the Main Street.  Great cocktails, great food.  The kids said it was the best Mac and cheese theyâ€™ve ever had and believe me theyâ€™ve tried many all over the world.  The staff were also so warm, itâ€™s hard to believe a restaurant in that popular of a location still maintains its â€œweâ€™re happy youâ€™re hereâ€ vibe.

2/5 stars because the outside dining area was nice and the Greek salad. Besides that, 0/5 stars. The hostess took us outside to get seated and seemed frustrated/annoyed that theyâ€™d forgotten a menu for us, but we said it was fine. 10 minutes had gone by and no server came to our table to ask for drinks and it seemed like there was just 1 server for the entire outdoor space. We had to wave the server down to get their attention.
We got the Greek salad to share which had kind of a lot of dill seasoning inside but regardless it was fine. I got the BBQ brisket with sweet potato fries and the person I was with got the grilled chicken with some side veggies. Sweet potato fries were fine. However, my sandwich was so disappointing. There were only fat slices, barely any meat, on the sandwich. And the meat was super chewy, overcooked. It literally felt like a scam. And there were no servers that came to check on us so I could say something, zero!! The person I was with, their chicken was so disgusting dry you had to sip water to swallow the food. I even questioned if it was precooked and microwaved.
We ate what we could to basically make our moneys worth, at the very least. We had to wave a server down again to pay for the check.
Overall, Iâ€™m never coming again. Huge waste of money. The only good thing was the Greek salad (which was quite mid) and the outdoor atmosphere.

Her spiser du godt i et ungdomligt moderne miljÃ¸. Maden smager frisk har god energi, og er rigtigt godt sat sammen.
Der er mange muligheder i den sunde og vegetariske genre. Alt vores mad smagte bare godt og ikke mindst kunne man tilvÃ¦lge eller blande ingredienser til retten. â™¥ï¸ tak for god mad hvor pris og kvalitet mÃ¸des.. 4 personer 100 usd 4 gingerale. ğŸ’ª

This could be one of my favorite places in new york.
The food is not salty but savory, the beer and espresso martini was perfect. I was so touched by the bartender's kindness. Thanks to him, my friend and I (from korea) made a great memory.
I recommend the burger with cheeze, It was sooo nice:)
Very tasty food at an amazing location and with a large patio. Its a perfect spot to grab a delicious and healthy meal. They cook veggies spectacularly and I always end up eating them all!!

I ordered the salad with added meat and it was one of the best salads I've ever had. The rest of my table ordered the chicken sandwich and wings, and everything was cooked to perfection. Our server, Irais, was excellent, she took our order exactly as we wanted it and was attentive to our table throughout. I'll definitely be back to try more items on the menu.
Great food, good ambience, good service. The Market Plate option was our favorite. Drinks menu has a bunch of good options too, including non-alcoholic cocktails.
I usually love to order from this location but Iâ€™m unfortunately disappointed by the amount of food Iâ€™ve been receiving. For $30 I should expect more than just one scrambled egg. Really?!

I was there a few months ago with my friends for one of their birthday. The food was great. The waitress was very kind and even gave us a candle on a slice of cake for her. We enjoyed our dinner. I would definitely recommend this restaurant. As a matter of fact I might be visiting with another good friend this Sunday. I do hope you will have the fish taco. I would like to try it. Once again I visited with my friends and the food was delicious also the drinks. Roberto our waiter was super good. Kudos,& Westville continue with your delicious food and excellent service. Best of luck. Hope to vid again.
